data.description: We are looking for an Area Design Intern to join us for our Obsidian University Internship Program. Come help us make our next world-class roleplaying game!Work closely with Area Designers and as well as Environment Artists, Narrative Designers, and Game System Designers to design area layouts and implement gameplay mechanics. Spend the summer learning with other RPG enthusiasts and working side-by-side with our developers to build fantastic worlds and contribute to the next great Obsidian title.ResponsibilitiesCreate and iterate on area and level layouts in Unreal Engine Implement gameplay for combat encounters, NPC conversations, quest scripting, and other game mechanicsRequirementsExperience with Unreal Engine Familiarity with conveying layouts and experiential design goals via documentation, top-downs, and editor blockoutsExcellent communication skills, including the ability to communicate design goals and concepts across disciplinesFamiliarity with the role-playing games genre, especially recent AAA role-playing gamesPlusesBackground in programming and/or scripting languagesExperience with pen-and-paper role-playing gamesExperience writing branching narrativesBackground in environment art including modeling, texturing, and/or lightingPassion for gaming and the games Obsidian makesPortfolio RequirementsA web portfolio that demonstrates one or more aspects of the internship position described aboveObsidian Entertainment is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.Please, no phone calls or drop-ins. We only accept electronic applications.The estimated base pay range for this role is:$22.00 - 26.00 per hourApplications will close on Friday, January 30th at 5:00 pm PST.
